name: MDSmartSearch.com
tag_list: health, healthcare, health-care, medical, medicine, physician, doctors, doctor, dentist, nurse, nursing-homes, hospital, clinic
overview:
Most American families go to their health care provider several times in a single year. The range of reason why they go is wide from a common cold to more serious terminal illnesses. What many American’s do not know in the case of the doctor can hurt them.

MDSmartSearch.com is an online tool created to give individuals the information they need to make well informed decisions about their healthcare providers.

MDSmartSearch.com helps individuals accomplish this in many ways:

*The latest health care provider demographics.

*The latest report from the government about sanctioned health care providers.

*The most popular medical terms.

*Quality information on prescription drugs and their side effects.

*Medical images database to help individuals self-diagnose and talk with their doctor.

*Hourly updates on health care news, blogs, videos, podcasts, journals, and more.

For health care providers, it allows you to keep a pulse on what other individuals are understanding about you and your medical background. Health care providers are encouraged to keep their profile complete and accurate to help the communities they serve.
